name: Skybound: Card Survival
description:
Banished and striped of free will...

As a punishment from the gods, you were trapped high up on some floating islands. Get ready for the ultimate card-based roguelite game


Show guidance.
Forge ahead to new islands, emboldened by the treasures you uncover in the chests along the way.


Unlock new cards.
Unlock new cards by completing challenges and pleasing the gods.


Gather.
Gather food, resources, potions and equipment to help you on your journey of survival.


Battle monsters.
The gods didn't leave you alone. They maliciously placed evil creatures to try and take your chance at freedom. Rise to the challenge and show your strength as the alpha predator of this realm.


Make it through the night
Drink a potion, eat a banana and take a break next to the campfire. The night is not the best time to go exploring the islands as many of its strongest inhabitants are nocturnal... and hungry!
